item.description:
This will be a very intimate event and will only be open to 4 photographers.

We will be shooting 1 set outdoors at dusk and the remainder of the work will be in the studio. There will be about 4 sets and wardrobe changes in a 3-4 hour period. The overall style will be portrait, glamor and editorial.

Each photographer will get plenty of 1:1 time with Cassie and be encouraged to create sets and lighting to reflect their own style and creativity.

Cassie is and absolutely stunning model with virtually perfect skin, beautiful smile, dirty blond hair. She is as good as it gets. Trust me on this.

If you are available and have been itching to work in this type of setting then this shoot is for you.
item.name: An Intimate Evenning with Cassie
